mapper.select: select * from a_app_startup_page where status = 1 order by createTime desc limit 0,1
select * from a_app_version where versionType = #{versionType} order by createTime desc limit 0,1
select code from u_user_code where userPhone = #{userPhone}
mapper.insert: insert into u_user (userPhone, passWord, userUrl, userSex, email, createTime, registerMethod, lastLoginTime, status) values (#{userPhone},#{passWord},#{userUrl},#{userSex},#{email},#{createTime},#{registerMethod},#{lastLoginTime},1)
insert into u_feedback (userId, content, createTime, userPhone) values (#{userId},#{content},#{createTime},#{userPhone})
